articles.author: Robert Gearty
articles.title: Tears expected at wake for slain Jersey City detective Joseph Seals
articles.description: Those expected at a wake Monday for murdered Jersey City detective Joseph Seals are many of his fellow brothers and sisters in blue.
articles.content:
Friends and family are set to gather Monday to pay tribute to murdered Jersey City detective Joseph Seals.
The afternoon wake is being held at a Jersey City funeral home. Seals’ funeral is Tuesday at Saint Aedan’s.

articles.description: A driver in England apparently caused his car to explode when he lit a cigarette after spraying air freshener inside, officials said.
articles.content:
